FuncDef: This command configures the maximum number of tunnels that may be used as ECMP next-hops for the VPRN. This value overrides any values that have been configured using theconfig>service>vprn>ecmpcommand.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of tunnels that may be used as ECMP next-hops for the VPRN. Values-0 to 32.
